name: Hexweaver

skills.name: Curse
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]

Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Dark Embrace
skills.raw_description:
Heals all allies by 15% of their MAX HP.

Lvl. 3 Heal +10%
Lvl. 4 Heal +10%

skills.name: Wings of Doom
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 15% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
